parameters.name: Async
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable asynchronous query.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the E-HPC cluster.

You can call the [ListClusters](~~87116~~) operation to query the cluster ID.

parameters.name: CreateTimeEnd
parameters.description: The latest time when a job is submitted. The value is a UNIX timestamp, which represents the number of seconds that have elapsed since the epoch time January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

parameters.name: CreateTimeStart
parameters.description: The earliest time when a job is submitted. The value is a UNIX timestamp, which represents the number of seconds that have elapsed since the epoch time January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

parameters.name: ExecuteOrder
parameters.description:
The order in which jobs are sorted based on the execution time. Valid values:

*   asc: ascending order
*   desc: descending order

parameters.name: JobName
parameters.description: The name of the job. Fuzzy search is supported.

parameters.name: JobStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the job. Valid values:

*   all
*   finished
*   notfinish

Default value: all.

parameters.name: Nodes
parameters.description: The information about the computing nodes that are used to run the job.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number to return.

Pages start from 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Maximum value: 50.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: PendOrder
parameters.description:
The order in which jobs are sorted based on the time when they queue. Valid values:

*   asc: ascending order
*   desc: descending order

parameters.name: Queues
parameters.description: The information about the queues in which the job is run.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region. You can call the [ListRegions](~~188593~~) operation to query the list of regions where E-HPC is supported.

parameters.name: SubmitOrder
parameters.description:
The order in which jobs are sorted based on the time when they are submitted. Valid values:

*   asc: ascending order
*   desc: descending order

parameters.name: Users
parameters.description: The users that run the job.
